name: Create Zendesk Sunshine profiles from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a row is added in your Google Sheets, Make will create a Zendesk Sunshine profile of it. We have created a (sample worksheet)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GFnJCm4YpYFmfsIkc2XfD0QBQ6EOhW8YdYi9zg1YcHk/edit?usp=sharing] for you to use it as a reference.
